vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play (patch_12.sol#80-101) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: uint256 wager = wagers[msg.sender];
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play.wager (local variable @ patch_12.sol#84) shadows:
	- PoCGame.wager (function @ patch_12.sol#70-78)

PoCGame.payout.wager (local variable @ patch_12.sol#107) shadows:
	- PoCGame.wager (function @ patch_12.sol#70-78)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function loseWager(address loser, uint256 wager) internal {
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.loseWager.wager (local variable @ patch_12.sol#120) shadows:

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.donateToWhale (patch_12.sol#114-118):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) (patch_12.sol#115)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (patch_12.sol#116)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.loseWager (patch_12.sol#120-124):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whale.call.value(wager / 2)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) (patch_12.sol#121)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (patch_12.sol#122)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: pragma solidity ^0.4.21;
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_12.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (patch_12.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in PoCGame.donateToWhale (patch_12.sol#114-118):
	-require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) patch_12.sol#115

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in PoCGame.loseWager (patch_12.sol#120-124):
	-require(bool)(whale.call.value(wager / 2)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) patch_12.sol#121
